messages.content: This election is close. Your vote will secure future progress or bring it to a screeching halt.

messages.title: Your vote can be the difference at this election
messages.content: If the Conservatives are able to hold seats like Lancaster and Fleetwood, they only need to win just 23 more to form a majority and keep Ed Miliband and the SNP out of Downing Street.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working to clear the economic plan - a vote for anyone else risks getting chaos of Ed Miliband and Labour, propped up by Nicola Sturgeon, Alex Salmond and the SNP for the next five years.
We've increased the state pension by £950 - we'll continue to increase it with our triple lock, so it rises by at least 2.5%, inflation or earnings, whichever is highest.
We've guaranteed that ISAs can be passed on to a spouse tax-free - now we'll take family homes out of inheritance tax by raising the effective threshold to £1 million.
We've introduced a cap on residential social care costs - we'll make sure no one is forced to sell their home to pay for care.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Ed Miliband, Nicola Sturgeon, Alex Salmond
mentions.tacticalSituation: If the Conservatives are able to hold seats like Lancaster and Fleetwood, they only need to win just 23 more to form a majority.

issues.economy: A vote for anyone else risks getting chaos of Ed Miliband and Labour, propped up by Nicola Sturgeon, Alex Salmond and the SNP for the next five years.

housing.content: We've introduced a cap on residential social care costs - we'll make sure no one is forced to sell their home to pay for care.

endorsements.endorsement: Don't risk it - for competence instead of chaos, vote Conservative.

quotes.text: Don't risk it - for competence instead of chaos, vote Conservative.

images.caption: Image of a couple reading a campaign leaflet.
